mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSTS (postNo, userNo, postRegDate, postTitle, postContent, postHit, postImg) VALUES(seq_post_no.nextval, #{userNo}, SYSDATE, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, 0, #{postImg})
mapper.select: SELECT postNo, userNo, postTitle, postContent, postRegDate, postHit, postImg FROM posts

SELECT p.postNo, p.userNo, u.userName, p.postTitle, p.postContent, p.postRegDate, p.postHit, p.postImg FROM posts p join users u ON p.userNo = u.userNo WHERE p.userno IN (SELECT relationTo FROM userrelation WHERE relationFrom=#{userNo} AND relationType=0) ORDER BY p.postRegDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO postliked (postLikedNo, postNo, userNo) VALUES(seq_liked_no.nextval, #{postNo}, #{userNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM postliked WHERE postNo = #{postNo} AND userNo = #{userNo}
